skins.shipDescription: An Shan-class destroyer No. 3 - Chang Chun (103)
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Chang Chun, the third ship of the Dragon Empery's An Shan-class destroyers, and one of the "Four Unbreakables." As one of the pillars of the Empery's navy, I played a pivotal role in the training of personnel. Eh? Fu Shun is getting into trouble again? An Shan is going to be worried...
skins.acquisition: Destroyer Chang Chun has arrived~ No, I'm not afraid of the cold~ I just like being warm and cozy~
skins.login: Good morning, Commander~ Ehehe, looks like it's not even morning anymore though~
skins.details: I definitely am not hiding the stuff that Fu Shun secretly bought.
skins.secretaryIdle1: The four of us are authentic noblewomen, you know~
skins.secretaryIdle2: During the summer, Tai Yuan will make a breezier version for me, so there's no problem.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Fu Shun, I heard that terrifying monsters appear in the academy after the sun goes down.
skins.secretaryTouch: Commander, if you like this outfit, I'll ask Tai Yuan to make a set for you as well.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, is this the type of person that you are?

skins.shipDescription: Ta-da! My pajamas are finally finished! Now to snuggle up until I'm all warm! Eh~ Ehhh? But sis, I don't want to get out! Ack, did Tai Yuan purposely make this tail big and thick to make it easier for you?
skins.acquisition: Ta-da! My pajamas are finally finished! Now to snuggle up until I'm all warm! Eh~ Ehhh? But sis, I don't want to get out! Ack, did Tai Yuan purposely make this tail big and thick to make it easier for you?
skins.login: A day's plan starts in the morning, a year's plan starts in the spring, and a life's plan with diligence. Commander, make sure to work hard, okay? I'll be cheering you on quietly from my dreams~
skins.details: Fu Shun said she's planning to blast apart an underwater volcano to turn the entire ocean into a hot spring... Thankfully, I don't think the water is getting any warmer~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, An Shan and Fu Shun are making dumplings tonight. What kind of filling would you like?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, let me massage your shoulders~
skins.secretaryIdle3: Fu Shun, do you still not have enough firecrackers? How would I know if this is enough to boil the entire sea?
skins.secretaryTouch: Tai Yuan has recently taken a liking to resting against me while reading. Commander, would you like to try it as well?
